name: Content Mastery - Perfecting YouTube
description: Content MasteryA comprehensive and tested Notion YouTube system to makes sure you post consistently AND stress-free on YouTube.Why did I create this?The ONLY certain path to success on YouTube is by posting consistent content for 2+ years.I knew this when I started my YouTube channel so my objective was to post every Tuesday.But... I always ended up last minute finding ideas, scripting something I was not very proud of, and rushing through the process.And worst of all... This process stressed me
